abstract: Profile of Christine Sinclair, member of Canada's national women's soccer team since 2000; Canada, host nation of Women’s World Cup, is favorite in tournament largely because of Sinclair, who now has 154 career goals, third on career international list behind Americans Abby Wambach and Mia Hamm.
lead_paragraph: Christine Sinclair entered Canada’s opening match Saturday night with 153 career goals, third on the international list behind Abby Wambach (182) and Mia Hamm (158).

headline.main: Face of Soccer in Canada, on Field and on Stamps
headline.print_headline: Face of Soccer in Canada, on Field and on Stamps

snippet: Christine Sinclair entered Canada’s opening match Saturday night with 153 career goals, third on the international list behind Abby Wambach (182) and Mia Hamm (158).
